bug.author: wanghuajia
bug.summary: It is found that the training effect of the model under win10 is completely different from that of ubuntu.
bug.description: It is found that the training effect of the model under win10 is completely different from that of ubuntu. In my data, the training result of the model under win10 is that the map is 0.5, and the result of ubuntu is that the map is 0.94. Is this a bug or a code setting

comments.comment:
Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wanghuajia>@wanghuajia</denchmark-link> , thank you for your interest in our work! Please visit our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>Custom Training Tutorial</denchmark-link> to get started, and see our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/blob/master/tutorial.ipynb>Jupyter Notebook</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/github/ultralytics/yolov5/blob/master/tutorial.ipynb></denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov5>Docker Image</denchmark-link> , and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/wiki/GCP-Quickstart>Google Cloud Quickstart Guide</denchmark-link> for example environments. If this is a bug report, please provide screenshots and minimum viable code to reproduce your issue, otherwise we can not help you. If this is a custom model or data training question, please note that Ultralytics does not provide free personal support. As a leader in vision ML and AI, we do offer professional consulting, from simple expert advice up to delivery of fully customized, end-to-end production solutions for our clients, such as:
Cloud-based AI systems operating on hundreds of HD video streams in realtime. Edge AI integrated into custom iOS and Android apps for realtime 30 FPS video inference. Custom data training, hyperparameter evolution, and model exportation to any destination.
For more information please visit <denchmark-link:https://www.ultralytics.com>https://www.ultralytics.com</denchmark-link> .

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/wanghuajia>@wanghuajia</denchmark-link> if you could plot both of your windows and ubuntu results.txt files together that would help analyze the difference. The files are in yolov5/runs/exp0/results.txt, just move them both into the main yolov5/ folder and then run the plotting command:
